abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Geometry POLYGON((-80 40,-70 40,-70 46,-80 46,-80 40))", "HasCoordinate is true", "HasGeospatialIssue is false", "TaxonKey is Apocynum androsaemifolium L.", "Year 1970-2021" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Moscow University Herbarium (MW) 1 records from Botany Division, Yale Peabody Museum 1 records from University of South Carolina, A. C. Moore Herbarium 1 records from E. C. Smith Herbarium (ACAD) 1 records from University of Alberta Vascular Plant Herbarium (ALTA-VP) 2 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) Seed Plant Collection 2 records from University of Florida Herbarium (FLAS) 2 records from Herbier Louis-Marie (QFA) - Collection de plantes vasculaires 3 records from Herbier du Qu√©bec (QUE) - Collection de plantes vasculaires 3 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 3 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Botany 4 records from R. L. McGregor Herbarium Vascular Plants Collection 4 records from The New York Botanical Garden Herbarium (NY) 6 records from University of Vermont, Pringle Herbarium 7 records from Geographically tagged INSDC sequences 9 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Herbarium 18 records from Marie-Victorin Herbarium (MT) - Plantes vasculaires 23 records from Royal Ontario Museum Green Plant Herbarium (TRT) 29 records from CONN 33 records from Pl@ntNet observations 35 records from Carnegie Museum of Natural History Herbarium 473 records from Pl@ntNet automatically identified occurrences 1426 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
